name: Christian Flake Lorenz
description:
'''Christian''' "'''Flake'''" '''Lorenz''' ({{IPA|de|ˈkʁɪsti̯a(ː)n ˈflaːkə ˈloːʁɛnts|lang}}; born 16 November 1966) is a German musician. He is best known as the keyboardist in [[Neue Deutsche Härte]] band [[Rammstein]], as well as the main composer of the band along with guitarist [[Richard Kruspe]]. He was also a member of the [[East German]] [[Punk rock|punk]] band [[Feeling B]].

Lorenz has released a solo album named ''Flake feiert Weihnachten'' ("Flake celebrates Christmas"), which consists of covers of popular Christmas songs.
